remarks: If two structures have the same ring components (properties), one is a ring iff the other one is.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.)
statement:
ringprop.b $e |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` L ) $.
ringprop.p $e |- ( +g ` K ) = ( +g ` L ) $.
ringprop.m $e |- ( .r ` K ) = ( .r ` L ) $.
ringprop $p |- ( K e. Ring <-> L e. Ring ) $.
